title: Add uploaded service photos throughout the website

requirements.summary: Display chip-level repair photos in Hardware Repairs service card
acceptanceCriteria: The Hardware Repairs service card displays one or more of the uploaded chip-level repair photos
Images are properly sized and maintain their aspect ratio
Photos enhance the visual representation of the chip-level repair service offering

file_operations.description: Integrate the uploaded chip-level repair photos (image_6217e92f~2.png, image_6217e92f~2-1.png, image_6217e92f~2-2.png, image_6217e92f~2-3.png) into the Hardware Repairs service card. Replace or supplement the existing service-hardware icon with the technician workbench photos showing motherboards, soldering equipment, and open desktop computer. Ensure images are responsive and maintain aspect ratio within the card layout.

requirements.summary: Display network infrastructure photos in Networking service card
acceptanceCriteria: The Networking service card displays one or more of the uploaded networking infrastructure photos
Images showcase professional LAN cabling and server configuration capabilities
Photos are integrated seamlessly within the existing card design

file_operations.description: Integrate the uploaded networking photos (Screenshot_20260222-122525~2.png, Screenshot_20260222-122525~2-1.png, Screenshot_20260222-122525~2-2.png, Screenshot_20260222-122525~2-3.png) into the Networking service card. Replace or supplement the existing service-network icon with the server rack and professional cabling photos showing blue and yellow network cables. Maintain consistency with the card design pattern.

requirements.summary: Display data recovery work photos in Data Recovery service card
acceptanceCriteria: The Data Recovery service card displays one or more of the uploaded hard drive recovery photos
Images demonstrate professional data recovery capabilities and equipment
Photos maintain consistency with other service section imagery

file_operations.description: Integrate the uploaded data recovery photos (image_17f3867a.png, image_17f3867a-1.png, image_17f3867a-2.png, image_17f3867a-3.png) into the Data Recovery service card. Replace or supplement the existing service-data icon with the hard drive examination photos showing specialized recovery equipment at the workbench. Ensure visual consistency across all service cards.

requirements.summary: Integrate uploaded service photos as optimized static assets
acceptanceCriteria: All 12 uploaded images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are optimized for web display without quality loss
Photo integration maintains the existing responsive design patterns
Images load efficiently and do not impact page performance

file_operations.description: Store the uploaded chip-level repair photo showing technician with motherboard and soldering equipment as a static asset for the Hardware Repairs service card.
Store the uploaded chip-level repair photo variant showing detailed workbench view as a static asset.
Store the uploaded chip-level repair photo variant showing open desktop computer as a static asset.
Store the uploaded chip-level repair photo variant as a static asset.
Store the uploaded networking photo showing server rack with blue and yellow cables as a static asset for the Networking service card.
Store the uploaded networking photo variant showing professional LAN infrastructure as a static asset.
Store the uploaded networking photo variant showing network configuration work as a static asset.
Store the uploaded networking photo variant as a static asset.
Store the uploaded data recovery photo showing hard drives being examined at workbench as a static asset for the Data Recovery service card.
Store the uploaded data recovery photo variant showing specialized equipment as a static asset.
Store the uploaded data recovery photo variant showing detailed recovery process as a static asset.
Store the uploaded data recovery photo variant as a static asset.
